error.try_again: Something went wrong, please try again
error.refresh_page: Something went wrong, try refreshing the page

kyc_step.title: Let's get started
kyc_step.subtitle: We are required to collect this information from you in order to issue you a credit card.

error.should_be_older: You must be at least 18 years old
error.should_be_under: You must be under 122 years old
error.cannot_be_future: Date cannot be in the future

verify_phone_step.title: Verify phone number
verify_phone_step.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code you received via SMS

verify_email_step.title: Verify Your Email
verify_email_step.subtitle: A verification email was sent to {{email}}.
verify_email_step.text_1: Check your email for a verification link from Archie. Once you have verified your email, we'll create your Archie Credit Line.

collateralization_step.title: Create your credit line
collateralization_step.subtitle: Select the crypto asset you'd like to collateralize and your desired credit limit

address.title: Send {{required_collateral}} to:
address.title_usdc: Send {{required_collateral}} to the below Ethereum address:
address.info_text_1: Make sure you only send {{selected_collateral_asset}} to this address. Please select another asset if you'd like to collateralize a different currency.
address.info_text_1_usdc: Make sure you only send {{selected_collateral_asset}} to this Ethereum address. Please select another asset if you'd like to collateralize a different currency.
address.info_text_2: We will settle receipt of your collateral after three confirmations.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.first: You may spend up to 75% of the value of your digital assets. We strongly suggest you maintain a line of credit less than {{loan_to_value}}% of your {{asset}} collateral.
terms.second: Your minimum payment is due monthly. You will receive an email reminder when your payment is due.
terms.third:
You will be notified to pay down your balance or add collateral if your
loan-to-value ratio exceeds 75%. You will be immediately partially liquidated if your loan-to-value ratio exceeds 90%.

card_step.subtitle:
You have submitted ${{total_value}} worth of collateral and have a ${{credit_value}} credit limit. Make sure
your email is verified before continuing.

email_verification_alert.title: Please verify your email
email_verification_alert.text_1: Check your email for a verification link from Archie. If you did not receive a verification email, click

collateral_received_modal.title: We received your collateral!
collateral_received_modal.text: Your collateral is now worth ${{collateralValue}}, giving you an initial credit line of ${{creditValue}}. You may provide more collateral to increase your credit line. Click 'next' when you're ready to get your Archie Card.

not_enough_collateral_modal.title: Add more collateral for your Archie Card
not_enough_collateral_modal.text: We've received your collateral, which is worth ${{creditValue}}. To receive an Archie card, you must provide at least ${{minValue}} in collateral value. Please add ${{difference}} of collateralized assets.

not_enough_collateral_toast.text: We've received ${{creditValue}} worth of collateral. You must collateralize ${{difference}} more in crypto assets to receive an Archie card.

collateral_credit_line_toast.text: You have collateralized {{collateral}} and will have an initial credit line of ${{creditValue}}.

limited_functionality_toast.title: App running with limited functionality
limited_functionality_toast.text: Due to network issues, the app isn't 100% operational. You can continue using it, but an occasional manual refresh may be necessary.

setup_2fa_banner.title: Protect your funds with 2FA
setup_2fa_banner.text: Setup Multi-Factor Authentication using your authenticator app.

close_to_margin_call_alert.title: You are close to entering a margin call!
close_to_margin_call_alert.text: The value of your ArchCredit collateral is nearing an LTV rate above 75%. We recommend taking action to prevent a margin call. To quickly remedy this issue, we recommend adding more collateral to your ArchCredit as  paying down your balance through your bank may take up to 3 business days.

margin_call_alert.title: Margin Call - Action Required
margin_call_alert.text_1: Your LTV is {{ltv}}%, which exceeds the 75% margin call threshold, as the value of your collateral has declined. To avoid liquidation, please send at least ${{minCollateral}} collateral to restore your LTV to below 75% before {{date}}.
margin_call_alert.text_2: Note that Archie may liquidate some of your collateral if your LTV exceeds 90% at any time, even if it is before the above date.

dashboard_withdraw.title: Withdraw {{currentAsset}}
dashboard_withdraw.subtitle: You currently have {{assetAmount}} {{asset}} (~${{assetValue}}).
dashboard_withdraw.address_title: What address would you like to send your {{currentAsset}} to?

form.amount_label: How much {{currentAsset}} would you like to withdraw? Max is {{maxAmount}}
form.address_label_usdc: Send {{currentAsset}} to the below Ethereum address:
form.credit_change: Withdrawing this amount will reduce your Archie Collateral from ${{initialCollateralValue}} to ${{updatedCollateralValue}}. This reduces your credit limit from ${{initialCreditValue}} to ${{updatedCreditValue}}

successfull_withdrawal_modal.title: Withdrawal successfully initiated
successfull_withdrawal_modal.subtitle: We have initiated your withdrawal request. Follow along on the

enter_2fa_code_modal.title: Enter Your 2-Factor Authentication Code
enter_2fa_code_modal.subtitle: To complete this action, please verify your 2-Factor Authentication Code from your 2FA application

dashboard_collateralization.title: Send {{selectedAsset}} to your Collateral Wallet
dashboard_collateralization.subtitle_credit: With ArchCredit, your Crypto is your credit. You currently have a ${{collateralTotalValue}} credit line. Add collateral to increase it.
dashboard_collateralization.subtitle_margin_call: To exit a margin call, you must bring your LTV below 75%. We suggest adding enough collateral to bring your LTV to 50% or below.

collateral_received_modal.title: We received your collateral!
collateral_received_modal.text: Your collateral is now worth ${{collateralValue}}, giving you an initial credit line of ${{creditValue}}.

connected_accounts.title: Accounts
connected_accounts.no_accounts: No accounts have been added yet. Connect to your Plaid account to start making payments.

plaid_connect.title: Setup payment method
plaid_connect.text: Let's connect your bank account so you can make payments.

support.title: Contact support
support.subtitle: Need help? Chat with Archie support

whitelisted_addresses.title: Manage whitelisted wallet addresses
whitelisted_addresses.subtitle: Manage addresses you can withdraw collateral to

error.cannot_be_past: Date cannot be in the past
error.max_amount: You cannot pay more than your owed balance

payment_confirm.title: Confirm payment
payment_confirm.time_note: This payment will be processed today and will take 2-4 business days to settle.

payment_scheduled.title: Payment scheduled
payment_scheduled.scheduled_note: Your payment of ${{newPayment}} has been scheduled for {{paymentDate}}!
payment_scheduled.email_note: You will receive an email notification.
payment_scheduled.time_note: Your payment will take 2-4 business days to settle.

pay_with_paypal_form.title: Pay balance
pay_with_paypal_form.time_note: This payment will be processed through Paypal and is subject to their terms and conditions.
pay_with_paypal_form.email_note: You will receive an email confirmation as soon as your payment has been processed.

autopay_modal.title: Manage Autopay
autopay_modal.schedule_text: Payments are automatically scheduled on each period's due date.
autopay_modal.balance_text: Payment will be the full statement balance of each period.

remove.title: Disable Autopay
remove.text: Are you sure you want to disable autopay? Doing so means you need to manually pay your statements.

reset_password_modal.title: Reset Password instructions sent
reset_password_modal.text: We've just sent you an email to reset your password.

change_2fa_modal.title: Change 2FA device
change_2fa_modal.text: Are you sure you want to remove 2FA from your current device?
